A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie ever Marketing misled audience that something huge would be revealed and it never happened. Midway through the the most useless subplot ever written began resulting in nothing. Thus subplot had no bearing on the films full plot as a whole. \nIt was convuluted and at times ridiculous. Awkward dialogue and Fisher was completly misused. Hamills character was basically assassinated. Do not see this movie.
